[[Tribbiani Sisters|Tina Tribbiani]] (granddaughter) }} '''Nonna''' is [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey's]] grandmother, who speaks English, portrayed by [[Penny Stanton]]. Nonna appeared in "[[The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister]]", in which she prepared dinner for her grandchildren and [[Chandler Bing]]. She prepared her granddaughter [[Mary-Angela]]'s favorite dessert, tiramisu. According to Joey, she was the sixth person to spit on Benito Mussolini's hanging dead body. It is never mentioned who among Nonna and [[Nonnie]] is Joey's paternal or maternal grandmother.
